column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH –------ A python crawled into the car driving to Chom Chao 3 commune
column4: Por Sen Chey district.------The accident happened at 9:20 am on November 19
column6: the driver left his house in Prey Pring Tbong 2 village
column8: and discovered the python curled under the seat.He went to commune authorities to wait for wildlife conservation officers.------Wildlife officials said this was the (104th?) python captured in Por Sen Chey district and will be sent to Tamao sanctuary for safe keeping.------POST NEWS
